title: Tabs squished together in tab bar - cannot see tabs
content: Today, I opened FF and found that I cannot see my unpinned tabs. They seem squished together (see image). I tried restarting FF (108.0) & my computer (running on Pop!OS 22.04, Gnome 42.5), but that didn't help. Tried disabling my Gnome extensions, didn't help. Tried changing FF theme, didn't help. Any help much appreciated! Thank you!
creator: mohan3142

title: Bookmark Menu Sidebar issues following the update to 108.0.1
content: The bookmarks menu sidebar disappears shortly after opening Firefox on its own after update to 108.0.1 and needs to be re-opened manually, why is this and is there a solution?

title: google
content: Everytime i search i keep getting popups with google asking me to sign in using google. No one is aking me to sign in and google is not my search engine. Google is the opposite of private and i believe its just another way to spy on me. I want it stopped. Im amazed you even allow the biggest spies on the internet to be part of your website!
creator: wt.51const

title: Firefox printig dialog stays on "Preparing preview" when network printer is offline.
content:
Hello!

Currently, I have a network printer added to my computer. When I want to print something with Firefox (either a webpage or a PDF) and the printer is online everything works fine. However, when the printer is offline (turned off) the printing dialog stays on "Preparing preview". I tried waiting for over 5 minutes and the dialog keeps loading on "Preparing preview".

I tried replicating this issue in Chrome. Chrome just switches to another printer if the currently selected printer is offline. The remote printer doesn't even appear on the printers list if its offline.

I found this issue which describes the problem I'm experiencing, https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=427285 However, it seems that it wasn't solve.

Is there any way to fix this issue? Thanks
creator: ichilaquiles

title: Installing google play store app on a dell windows 10 computer
content: 12/23/22 After trying for a week to install your mozilla software (thinking this would help to install google play store apps) on my Dell windows pc - it never worked so I requested a refund. I still need assistance in using the firefox browser to install a google play store app specifically the LaView app. Would appreciate your assistance. Henry Mazik
creator: hmazik

title: Every time I close Firefox browser, my theme disappears and is reset to the standard Windows 11 theme.
content: Please tell me how to keep the Firefox theme I choose (color and tabs). I'm using a new PC with Windows 11 and did not have this problem on my older computer. Nothing else is a problem -- all extensions are kept, my bookmarks and toolbars are correct, etc. But every time I close the browser, the theme resets to the Windows 11 preset.
creator: elizabethsyoung

title: Browser window slides sideways
content:
When I open a new browser window the page slides sideways, how do I turn this effect off? It never did this before, and it is extremely annoying.

The new window appears to slide from the left side of the screen across the screen until it is fully visible; that's what I am trying to describe. As if a card was being dragged out of the left side of the screen, across the page. I hope someone knows how to make this animation stop, please?
creator: overthedam

title: Closing a synced tab from another device
content:
Is it possible? Scenario:

Open a tab on mobile phone. View tab on PC. Close tab on PC.

I don't want this tab open anywhere anymore. Is there a way to close the phone tab from my PC? Not being able to do so makes this feature cumbersome and of limited use.

Thanks
creator: lisa27

title: Extremely weird youtube lag
content:
Something EXTREMELY STRANGE is going on. I'm not even going to pretend i understand why, but i know what weird stuff fixes it.

Youtube causes a ton of slowdown and memory/cpu usage on my laptop. Im not sure if its because of google making youtube run worse on other browsers or its because my laptop is an old macbook air. probably both.

Heres the extremely strange part, When i put the video into picture in picture and switch to another tab, the lag just stops and it runs perfectly smooth and causes no tempurature increase, fans spinning up, or anything else indicating heavy memory consumption.

It isnt even youtube scaling it down because its in a lower size in the picture in picture thing either. I can double click on the picture in picture thing in another tab that isnt youtube and it runs just as fine in perfect quality.

First image at 62% is youtube when in the youtube tab the second image is youtube when in picture in picture while not in the youtube tab
creator: amananon8

title: Image size
content:
Hi Why does the size of the images change when opening the images in the Firefox browser and larger images are displayed? This problem does not exist in version 100. 

please check it 7% is added to the height and width.

I tested it in the version 100 of your browser and there was no problem
creator: miladaniknam

title: How to avoid "open when completed" on Firefox downloads
content:
I use the 102.6.0esr (64-bit) Firefox browser.

For some reason, the ongoing downloads window has begun to open certain video and audio files when the download is complete. Clicking on some downloads in progress and with the same data type (say, mp4) brings up "Open when completed." Others of the same type do not open but save the file. I would like to turn the open when completed option off for all video and audio files.

I've followed the directions in the setting command for mp4 and other video formats--which indicate that the file should be saved. You can see this:
creator: kenwald
